title: AIProject Planner |Gantt & JIRA| Dividing tasks among team roles | by cxto21
original_prompt:
In the ocurrence of mermaid diagrams should be inside "~~~" instead of the classical notation of markdown block codes. The total generated text must be in the language {Lang:English} in a block of code in markdown language and the requirements must have a reference notation in the different parts of the document.

- The document inside a code block of markdown is a work breakdown structure to carry out a project specified as "{Project Description:Delivery service application using Blockchain technology}". Recognizing tasks and dividing between the teams of groups specialized in: {Team roles:Product Manager, QA Tester, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, Software Security Engineer}.
Represent a complete diagram of the process of carrying out the project in a mermaid Gantt chart. 
Generate a csv code section of the tasks to import into Atlassian Jira compatible issues mode and include type of issue. The project must be carried out within the period from {Start Date:May 1} to {End Date:May 16}
input1:
# Work Breakdown Structure for Delivery Service Application using Blockchain Technology

## Project Overview
The project aims to develop a delivery service application leveraging blockchain technology to ensure secure and transparent transactions.

## Team Roles
- Product Manager
- QA Tester
- Backend Developer
- Frontend Developer
- Software Security Engineer

## Tasks
1. **Requirement Gathering** (Product Manager)
   - Duration: 2 days
   - Start: May 1
   - End: May 2

2. **System Design** (Backend Developer, Frontend Developer)
   - Duration: 3 days
   - Start: May 3
   - End: May 5

3. **Development Phase** (Backend Developer, Frontend Developer)
   - Duration: 6 days
   - Start: May 6
   - End: May 11

4. **Testing Phase** (QA Tester, Software Security Engineer)
   - Duration: 3 days
   - Start: May 12
   - End: May 14

5. **Deployment** (All Teams)
   - Duration: 2 days
   - Start: May 15
   - End: May 16

~~~mermaid
gantt
    title Delivery Service Application Development
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    section Requirement Gathering
    Requirement Gathering          :a1, 2023-05-01, 2d
    section System Design
    System Design                 :after a1  , 3d
    section Development Phase
    Development Phase             :after a2  , 6d
    section Testing Phase
    Testing Phase                 :after a3  , 3d
    section Deployment
    Deployment                    :after a4  , 2d
~~~

## CSV Code for Jira Import
```
Issue Type,Summary,Description,Assignee,Start Date,Due Date
Task,Requirement Gathering,Collect requirements for the application,Product Manager,2023-05-01,2023-05-02
Task,System Design,Design the system architecture,Backend Developer,2023-05-03,2023-05-05
Task,Development Phase,Develop the application features,Backend Developer,2023-05-06,2023-05-11
Task,Testing Phase,Conduct testing and security checks,QA Tester,2023-05-12,2023-05-14
Task,Deployment,Deploy the application to production,All Teams,2023-05-15,2023-05-16
```
input2:
# Work Breakdown Structure for Delivery Service Application using Blockchain Technology

## Project Overview
The project focuses on creating a delivery service application that utilizes blockchain technology for enhanced security and efficiency in transactions.

## Team Roles
- Product Manager
- QA Tester
- Backend Developer
- Frontend Developer
- Software Security Engineer

## Tasks
1. **Market Research** (Product Manager)
   - Duration: 2 days
   - Start: May 1
   - End: May 2

2. **Architecture Planning** (Backend Developer, Frontend Developer)
   - Duration: 4 days
   - Start: May 3
   - End: May 6

3. **Implementation** (Backend Developer, Frontend Developer)
   - Duration: 5 days
   - Start: May 7
   - End: May 11

4. **Quality Assurance** (QA Tester, Software Security Engineer)
   - Duration: 4 days
   - Start: May 12
   - End: May 15

5. **Final Review and Launch** (All Teams)
   - Duration: 1 day
   - Start: May 16
   - End: May 16

~~~mermaid
gantt
    title Delivery Service Application Development
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    section Market Research
    Market Research               :a1, 2023-05-01, 2d
    section Architecture Planning
    Architecture Planning          :after a1  , 4d
    section Implementation
    Implementation                :after a2  , 5d
    section Quality Assurance
    Quality Assurance              :after a3  , 4d
    section Final Review and Launch
    Final Review and Launch       :after a4  , 1d
~~~

## CSV Code for Jira Import
```
Issue Type,Summary,Description,Assignee,Start Date,Due Date
Task,Market Research,Conduct market research for the application,Product Manager,2023-05-01,2023-05-02
Task,Architecture Planning,Plan the architecture of the application,Backend Developer,2023-05-03,2023-05-06
Task,Implementation,Implement the application features,Backend Developer,2023-05-07,2023-05-11
Task,Quality Assurance,Perform quality assurance testing,QA Tester,2023-05-12,2023-05-15
Task,Final Review and Launch,Review and launch the application,All Teams,2023-05-16,2023-05-16
```
